It's kind of incredible how this was Valve's first game. Good gameplay, good level design, aside from the latter half of the game this game still holds up pretty well. And don't worry this game can run on a potato and if the graphics bother you look into Black Mesa.
good game. that's all there is to it

I started playing the Half-Life series lately, as preparation for Half Life: Alyx.
this game is ok, not as good as half Life 2, but it was out in 1998, windows xp was not even out back then, 
this game (probably) run on windows 98 on launch, so it is really unfair to compere it to Half life 2,
for it's time it is impressive game.
looking forward to try Alyx now.
is very good yes yes mr.freeman
This is a game from the time where 3 years makes graphics go from literal 2D pictures to 3D graphics, so it's obviously pretty good

Total classic. Story-line is amazing. The music enhances the whole experience by a lot and I would recommend this to anyone who loves a good run-n-shoot fuck shit up (screw stuff up) game. The puzzles are crafted really well and still holds up to this very day as one of the best FPS games ever. Avoid the Source port version of the game if you can, and if you want a graphically better experience, pick up Black Mesa.

[b] If you're having issues with the music cutting out, download the Half-Life soundtrack from the Store page. [/b]

its a fun game to play when you wanna get into a fun story game. the only problems is how difficult it can get some times having to save kill something save kill something move and save ext. other  then that its a fun game and i highly recommend playing it before half life 2 and alyx.
El primer juego que me eche y un de los mejor que tiene valve
This game aged so well. A great horror survival FPS, i prefet this over half-life 2.
One of the first FPS games I have ever played, along with System Shock 2, shaping my taste in video games permanently. I have no regrets.
It is just a really crazy cool game. Classic Valve at its finest.

Absolutely phenomenal Sci-Fi story. Going through the ruins of Black Mesa and surrounding areas never feels rushed or out of place. Half Life's atmosphere is creepy and mysterious at times, and leaves you wanting to go through the whole journey once more

i honestly think this game is more fun than half life 2. this game can be really hard and it just kind of feels like half life 2 is a baby mode version of this games combat, allbeit more refined. enough about its sequel, what do i think of half life? it's one of the best games i've played on here, no joke. each area is so fun, playing through it still feels so badass. i love the blocky textures and the goofy music/npcs. and on top of all this, this game goes for pennies during the summer/winter sales. such a fucking steal dude. pick this game up during the next summer or winter sale, it's totally worth it
It's old, but it's still great. Sure the graphics have aged but the gameplay sure hasn't.
